TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartEventHandler(object sender, WebPartEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event, event, event, event, or event of a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 中指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler>委托时将会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>引发事件。
页开发人员可以通过添加为 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartAdded`属性，`OnWebPartDeleted`属性，`OnWebPartClosed`属性，`OnWebPartMoved`属性，或`OnSelectedWebPartChanged`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素在页面中，并为属性指定自定义的方法名称。 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。
